publicPrompts.title: Public Prompts Library
publicPrompts.description: Discover and use prompts shared by the community
publicPrompts.searchPlaceholder: Search prompts by title, content, or tags...
publicPrompts.adjustSearch: Try adjusting your search terms or category/filter.

tour_intro: Let's take a quick tour to show you how to use AskHole effectively.
tour_sidebar: This is your main navigation hub. Here you can access all your chats, create and manage prompts, and explore the public library.
tour_sidebar_history_tab: View and search all your previous chat conversations. Click on any chat to continue where you left off.
tour_sidebar_prompts_tab: Create, save, and organize your custom prompt templates. Perfect for frequently used questions or tasks.
tour_sidebar_public_tab: Explore prompt templates shared by the community. Find inspiration and discover new use cases.
tour_mobile_sidebar: Tap this menu button to open the sidebar and access your chats, prompts, and settings.
tour_new_chat: Tap this button to start a new chat conversation.
tour_message_input: Type your messages here and press Enter or click send. You can also attach files and toggle image generation mode.
tour_model_selector: Select the AI model you want to use for this conversation. Different models have different capabilities and costs.
tour_message_list: Your conversation appears here. You can copy messages, delete them, or add them to your prompt library.
tour_complete_message: You can restart this tour anytime by clicking the help button in the sidebar. Happy chatting!

telegram_linking_description: Link your Telegram account to enable password recovery via Telegram messages.
telegram_instruction_2: Send the following code to the bot:
telegram_instruction_3: Wait for confirmation from the bot
telegram_link_instructions: Generate a linking code to connect your Telegram account for password recovery.
telegram_linked_benefit: You can now recover your password via Telegram messages.
telegram_unlink_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unlink your Telegram account? You will no longer be able to recover your password via Telegram.
telegram_prompt_title: Link Your Telegram for Account Security
telegram_prompt_description: We recommend linking your Telegram account to enable password recovery. Without it, you may lose access to your account and all your chat history.
telegram_prompt_warning: Warning: If you forget your password and haven't linked Telegram, you will permanently lose access to your entire chat history and personal prompts database.
forgot_password_description: Enter your email or username. If your account is linked to Telegram, you'll receive a password reset link via Telegram message.
forgot_password_success_message: If an account exists with that email or username, and it's linked to Telegram, a password reset link has been sent.
password_reset_successfully: Password reset successfully! You can now log in with your new password.
admin_reset_password_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the password for user: {{username}}?
admin_reset_password_warning: This will generate a temporary password and invalidate all existing sessions for this user.
admin_temp_password_generated: A temporary password has been generated for this user:
admin_share_password_securely: Share this password with the user through a secure channel. They should change it immediately after logging in.
user_account_description: Manage your account settings and preferences
user_account_username_validation: Username must be at least 3 characters long
user_account_email_hint: We'll use this email for important notifications
user_account_email_validation: Please enter a valid email address
user_account_new_password_validation: Password must be at least 6 characters long
user_account_password_requirements: At least 6 characters, must contain letters and numbers
user_account_delete_description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
user_account_delete_confirm_description: This will permanently delete your account and remove all your data from our servers. This action cannot be undone.
user_account_delete_success: Your account has been successfully deleted
